index.DIV_106: Grab N' Go PPE Kits to keep you safe and protected.
index.DIV_114: As you head back to work, make sure to protect yourselves, employees, and customers. We’ve designed new personal protection kits that can be tailored to your need. They include everything needed to ensure your customers, clients, employees, and students are safe. Stay ahead of your competitors by providing a personalized PPE kit.
index.DIV_116: Grab N' Go PPE Kits to keep you
index.P_120: *For bulk orders, Please contact to us.
index.P_132: Schools and Universities. Give your students the right supplies so they can learn with freedom of mind.
index.P_155: Let your drivers’ journeys be germ-free.
index.P_178: Show your employees and customers that you care about their safety.
index.P_199: Be the perfect host. Give your guests a germ-free getaway.
index.P_217: Conventions, Concerts, Shows, Sports Games and more.
index.P_218: Keep the tunes rollin, the crowd dancing and those germs far away.
index.P_241: Germs travel fast. They don’t travel through our airports, though.
index.DIV_254: Increase brand awareness by engaging your customers and keeping them protected.
index.DIV_263: We learned not to take our health for granted. We learned that our actions have an impact far greater than we realize. We learned that staying healthy is not a solitary journey anymore. It’s about your family, friends, employees - it’s about all of us. It’s about taking responsible actions to keep us all safe. It’s about the little things that we do to help one another. At PPE Buddy, we make it easy for you to keep yourself safe. We want to help you stay protected. That’s why we created PPE kits that work for you, wherever you are.
index.DIV_264: The beautiful part? You’re keeping the people around you safe, too.
index.P_272: 250 W Nyack Rd, West Nyack, NY 10994

setup-guide.P_4: Before proceeding with the template configuration, make sure you have an active Shopify account. If you don't know how to do that, please follow this
setup-guide.P_8: Once your design is finished, you can finally export your template.
setup-guide.H3_9: 3. Convert with the Udesly Adapter App
setup-guide.P_10: Open the Udesly Adapter Web APP you can find on
setup-guide.P_12: and choose the Shopify section to upload your template. Upload the .zip file of the template you've exported from Webflow, insert template data (template name, author name, template description) and start the conversion.
setup-guide.P_13: If you accidentally delete some attributes or added the wrong ones, the conversion process will end with an error message like the one in the screenshot.
setup-guide.P_14: You’ll find all the missing attributes and the wrong ones that you’re required to fix. This will help you go back to your project and correct everything to launch a new, successful, conversion. If you need help with this, you can always contact us from our
setup-guide.H3_17: 3. Upload and activate the converted theme in Shopify
setup-guide.P_18: Once the conversion is ended you can download the converted template (zip file) on your pc. Now you can upload the converted theme (.zip file) from your Shopify admin panel.
setup-guide.STRONG_20: On Line Store-> Themes and then click on the “Upload Theme” button.
setup-guide.STRONG_21: Don't forget to Activate the Theme
setup-guide.P_23: Once Activated the theme, you will able to add your very first product. Go to
setup-guide.P_27: Each static page you've created in Webflow must be created in Shopify as well.
setup-guide.STRONG_28: Remember to assign the corresponding template to each of these pages from Shopify template selector.
setup-guide.P_29: In Foodo you'll find 2 static pages:
setup-guide.P_39: Menus in Shopify can be created by following the path
setup-guide.P_41: . Don't forget to create the menu in Shopify and take note of the handle of the menu, otherwise your menu will not work at all. In Foodo we used the handle
setup-guide.P_43: . That's how our menu must be named. If you want to change it, you have to change the handle in Webflow, first.
setup-guide.P_45: We added dynamic Sections in Home page. Dynamic means that they can be enabled or disabled by your customer following the path
setup-guide.P_47: In particular, you'll find a dynamic section named
setup-guide.P_49: allowing to control the 2 images just under the hero. So follow the path as described above, choose Features section and add the images you want to display, to the left and to the right, with corresponding texts that are editable as well.
setup-guide.P_50: Then, you'll find another dynamic section named
setup-guide.P_52: that's the Slider you'll find in Home page, from which section you'll be able to change each slide that compose it.
setup-guide.P_55: , you have to connect each Product List you get in Webflow (Recent Posts, Recent Products, Related Products) to the corresponding Collection in Shopify. Also, you can manage the number of Collection items to display for each single Collection.
setup-guide.P_57: You can make customer accounts required or optional, or disable them altogether. When creating an account, customers are redirected to a separate account creation page. To edit your customer account settings:
setup-guide.P_58: From your Shopify admin, go to
setup-guide.P_62: section, and choose a customer account option:
setup-guide.H3_70: Where I have to add CMS content?
setup-guide.P_71: Note that you have to insert the CMS content (posts, products, categories etc.) directly in WordPress.
setup-guide.STRONG_72: The CMS content you'll create in Webflow will not be exported.
setup-guide.P_76: . Once finished you only have to export the code, convert it again and re-upload the new Theme in WordPress.

faq.DIV_103: Can I change my order after I have completed it?
faq.P_104: Once you have chosen to purchase your order and the payment has been processed, you will not be able to change it. The only way to amend this would be to cancel the order before it is processed and shipped, and make a new order with the correct details.
faq.DIV_105: Can I change my shipping address after I have placed my order?
faq.P_106: You will not be able to make changes to an order once it has been placed and paid. The only way to amend this would be to cancel the order before it is processed and shipped, and make a new order with the correct shipping address.
faq.DIV_107: How can I confirm that my order is being processed?
faq.P_108: As soon as your order is made, you will receive an email informing you that it is being processed.
faq.DIV_109: How do I know that my order has been dispatched?
faq.P_110: As soon as your order has been dispatched, you will receive a second email informing you that is is on its way to you.
faq.DIV_111: How long before I receive my order?
faq.P_112: The shipping and delivery time can be expected to take between 3-5 business days for orders within the United States, while international orders may take up to 14 business days to arrive.
faq.DIV_113: Is it possible to have my package sent to a third party or an address other than the billing address on the invoice?
faq.P_114: During the checkout process, you will have the option to input both your billing address as well as your shipping address. Your order will then be process after payment and shipped to the address you have given as your shipping address.
faq.DIV_115: Where is my order shipping from?
faq.P_116: Our products ship from the USA.
faq.DIV_117: My order hasn’t arrived yet. How can I find out where it is?
faq.P_118: Once your order has been dispatched, you will be sent a confirmation email which will lead you to the page where you can track your order.
faq.DIV_119: I have received my order but would like to return it. How do I do that?
faq.P_120: If you decide that you would like to return your order upon receiving it, you may contact our customer service to inform them that you would like to process a return and refund. This can take up to 30 days to process, or longer, depending on how you have made the payment for your order. You will be asked to send the order back unopened and unused and in all its original and undamaged packaging. Once the order arrives at our dispatch centre and has been approved for a refund, we will begin to process your refund.
faq.DIV_121: Can I exchange an item for another?
faq.P_122: Items purchased cannot be returned and exchanged for another. Should you decide to change your order after receiving it, you may contact our customer service to help you process a return and refund. You may then make a new order with the correct items.
faq.DIV_123: How much will it cost to return a product?
faq.P_124: The cost of processing a return may vary depending on your location. You may contact our customer service to assist you further in this process.
faq.DIV_125: How long does it take for me to receive my refund?
faq.P_126: The processing time for a refund may vary depending on your payment option and their procedures. You may contact our customer service to get more details about refund processing times and your chosen payment option.
faq.DIV_127: I have received the wrong item. What do I do?
faq.P_128: If you have received the wrong items in your order, you can double check the details of your order and then contact our customer service to help you process a return and refund, as well create a new order with the correct items. If an error occurred on PPEBuddy’s end, we will shoulder the costs of the return.
faq.DIV_129: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.P_130: We accept payments made via PayPal, debit and credit card.
faq.DIV_131: When will my card be charged?
faq.P_132: All payments will be charged at the time of purchase.
faq.DIV_133: How can I be sure that your online payment site is secure?
faq.P_134: The security your payments are closely monitored by our team to prevent any unauthorised charges as well as protect the privacy of your personal information. We assure you that all payments made via our website are tested for utmost security.
faq.DIV_135: Are your products FDA approved and meet the CDC’s recommended standards?
faq.P_136: Yes! PPEBuddy strictly follows the FDA guidelines in the production of PPE products, as well as the CDC’s recommendation of containing at least 65% alcohol in order to ensure the effectivity of our hand sanitisers and disinfecting wipes.
faq.DIV_137: Are your products safe to use on children?
faq.P_138: Yes they are safe to be used on children under adult supervision. They should not be stored within reach of children for their unsupervised access, as it can be harmful to ingest any type of disinfectant or alcohols.
faq.DIV_139: How effective is hand sanitiser against COVID-19?
faq.P_140: Our hand sanitisers and disinfecting wipes contain at least 70% alcohol, which makes them an effective ally in the fight against infectious diseases and viruses, which can be transferred from human to human in many ways. Our products kill up to 99.9% of bacteria which can be harmful to our health.
faq.DIV_141: Do your hand sanitisers and disinfecting wipes have an expiration date?
faq.P_142: When stored correctly, our hand sanitisers and disinfecting wipes can be used for up to two years.
faq.DIV_143: Where should I store my hand sanitiser and disinfecting wipes?
faq.P_144: PPEBuddy products should be stored our of reach, and sight, of children and in temperatures no higher than 105°F. Keeping your products at room temperature is the safest way to store them.
faq.DIV_145: Are your face masks comfortable for all-day wear?
faq.P_146: Our masks are made with your comfort in mind and can be used comfortably, all day. The inner layer of the mask is made of soft hypoallergenic fabric, which prevents skin irritation due to friction.
faq.DIV_147: What can your face masks protect me from?
faq.P_148: Our masks are made to effectively reduce the spread of droplets, which helps prevent the transmission of bacterial and viral diseases that may harm your health. We use a 3-ply filter system which is made of 3 layers - an outer layer which filters dust and pollen, a middle layer containing polypropylene, which protects you from bacteria, and an inner layer which is made of soft hypoallergenic fabric for comfort.
faq.DIV_149: Are your face masks safe for medical use?
faq.P_150: Our masks are ideal for everyday use as well, for the general public, as well as for medical professionals.
faq.DIV_151: Are your face masks better than a home-made cloth mask?
faq.P_152: Our masks are made with special filters which have been proven and tested to reduce the spread of droplets.
faq.P_154: Our products are produced in our own facilities in Mexico.
faq.P_157: 250 W Nyack Rd, West Nyack, NY 10994
